function.name: cookingTimer_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the cooking time of a cooker by a specified duration.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking time is being increased.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking time is being increased.

cookingTimer.description: The additional duration to be added to the existing cooking time.
